General.Name: Chialin Precision Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Chialin Precision Industrial Co., Ltd. provides terminal and connector, lead frame, antenna, and other products in Taiwan. Its products include bandolier pins and various kinds of connector terminals; mobile and computer connectors; lamp and piranha lead frames; SMD lead frames; and antennas, as well as other products, such as EMI spring finger and shielding case. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.110, Heping West Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 337
